name: Hallowed Reed
senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) radiant damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, it takes 2 (1d4) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hallowed reed can’t grasp another target. Undead and fiends have disadvantage on ability checks made to escape the grapple.
actions.name: Searing Grasp

special_abilities.desc: The hallowed reed knows if a creature within 30 feet of it is good-aligned or not.
special_abilities.name: Like Calls to Like

special_abilities.desc: Using telepathy, a hallowed reed can magically communicate with any other good-aligned creature within 100 feet of it. This communication is primarily through images and emotions rather than actual words.
special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy

special_abilities.desc: If a hallowed reed is slain, a new patch of hallowed reeds will grow in the same spot starting within a week of its death. Charring or salting the ground where a hallowed reed was slain prevents this resurgence.
special_abilities.name: Rebirth
